other_tests.findings: Squamous epithelium within normal limits at the GE junction. Gastric mucosa with mild acute and chronic inflammation and regenerative changes. Antral mucosa with mild chronic inflammation. No bacteria.
Transverse colon and rectal adenoma polyp.

Gallbladder appears distended with small amount of perihepatic free fluid. Subtle hyperemia of the adjacent hepatic parenchyma noted. Main portal vein patent. Normal spleen, pancreas, adrenals, and kidneys. No concerning liver lesions or biliary ductal dilation. No signs of ileus or obstruction in small bowel.
